name: Broken Soul
description:
Bring Happiness to the world !

Your soul feel broken from the world's bad mood. But you are decided to repair it by spreading happiness to the world ! Show them the true nature of your soul, the link between you and it is the key to save the world from depression until everyone is Joined Together !

Credits :

Arts : Ankorisu, Boss art

Sounds : Neige

Developpment : Gordito

Developpment/GD : Mugiwawa & Strublar
